info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 8:45PM EDT until July 29 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MECKLENBURG COUNTY... At 845 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles east of Boydton to 9 miles south of Clarksville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Clarksville, Boydton, Nelson, Rogers Corner, Richardson, Buffalo Junction, Finchley, and John H Kerr Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
